dct_title_s: Nieuwe kaart van Choromandel ende Malabar
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:2,300,000 ; (E 72°17'00"--E 84°50'00"/N 19°00'00"--N 8°00'00"). Relief shown pictorially. Date from previous call number. Shows southern India and northern Sri Lanka. In Dutch.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dcat_keyword_sm: India, South Maps Early Works to 1800
